item.title: Creating Vim binding for checkbox using regex for lua configuration
item.description: So I have todo list in my vim notes and I wanted to create vim bindings to create checkbox ,close checkbox,open checkbox.I found a article by marcelfischer which had a similar requirement.He had used regex to do so.I decided to do the same for my lua configuration. Requirement If there is item with * then we need to add a checkbox 1 2 * todo item 1 * will change into
